article_title: The Four Tax Breaks (And Two Senators) That Killed The Tax Extender Deal

article_metadata.description: When you woke up on the morning of January 1, 2014, it was more than just your pants and your dignity that had gone missing. Also gone were 55 tax breaks, many of which are routinely used by businesses and individual taxpayers alike. How can this be? The Code is about as permanent as [...]
